error.signature: Error: Backend initialization required, please run 'terraform init'

verdict.summary: Terraform backend configuration changed but terraform init wasn't run to apply the change.

dead_ends.why_fails: May corrupt the local state cache

dead_ends.action: Copying state files between backends manually
dead_ends.why_fails: Easy to lose state or corrupt it; use terraform init -migrate-state instead

workarounds.action: Run terraform init to initialize the new backend
workarounds.how: Terraform will prompt to migrate state if the backend changed

workarounds.action: Use terraform init -migrate-state to move state between backends
workarounds.how: Safely copies state from old backend to new backend during init

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Both produce similar messages, but 'backend-initialization-required' and 'cycle-in-module' differ in root cause and environment context.
Both produce similar messages, but 'backend-initialization-required' and 'invalid-provider-config' differ in root cause and environment context.
